name: Acid Rain Restored
description:
- Adds functioning acid rain back into the game. 
- This is a sub-mod of Cataclysm Restored, 
- install Cataclysm Restored FULL for the complete package. 
- Tip: Light Acid Drizzle causes no damage, seek shelter when you see this weather.  
- Known Issues: 
- Damage may be too high, acid only effects torso, acid doesn't damage clothing. 
- Weather is rare in cataclysm to begin with, acid rain occuring will be even more rare.
